Ai the value becomes 100 points and the move is completed immediately because the player who made the general\'s mouth wins the match with the independent sovereign point if another player is winning.

Let\'s learn how to play Bozo First of all you will need. a cup of Bozo and Five data. After Participants will have to decide who will start Á several ways to desidir that more will the explanation. The player who is starting will put the five data in the cup and shake until blended. And then throws on the table. Ai remove the glass carefully. not to untap the data. If given after the glass is untapped. Are one on top of another. This move error is not counted and the player can play again. Remembering! It\'s time to mix the data in the cup the mouth of it must be closed to not drop any data out of the cup. then made the first move. The player will still have two more chances to throw the dice. Just to confirm. After the first move he will choose what kind of play will want to do. If you want more details of the moves push the screen to the left or click the right arrow to more informções. The types of possible moves within the Bozo. Are these. The. Duke. Suit. Block. Quina. Seine. FUL. Then. Square. General. As in the illustration below. The mark you make. It will depend on the stones that come, fter the three shots. But you can mark what you want. For a good player follows a strategy. Since we\'re talking strategy, using the basic strategy. You will choose the values ​​that are repeated more or worth more points. Remember that to mark should add the values ​​obtained by the game you have chosen. More has some exceptions like the move. FUL. Then. Square. General. Why these moves have already set scores. Time to score points you can not add all the points but choose a type of game and then you can add. I will give an example here for you. If I have two duques.E three cornered. In this example I will talk about two kinds of possible moves. Well first let\'s assume that I want the corner. Why it is worth more and is also the most repeated. Then I\'ll add these TES machines, totaling fifteen points. Then I mark on the table in our application. Fifteen points in corner. But the other kind of play. As you can see. When you have two data which is Duke\'s value. And TES data from the edge value. It is also formed FUL move. That perhaps it was made the first shot. And when such a move is carried out in one fell swoop. It uses the term play of mouth. then the play gets 5 points more and FUL. Becomes worth 15 points. Then I can score table. in Joagada FUL. An important example. It is the general\'s mouth. When the player makes a move the mouth of General ie if coming five stones of qualqer value all the same. General forty points. Becomes one hundred points. Oh no way. The player who made that kind of move. Win instantly with sovereign point. And the game is finished regardless of whether another player was already winning. Basically this is how you play a Bozo.
Or AZ play or also called the data number 1 Az is the sum of its values which can vary from 1 to 5 points.
The data AZ or peace move. It can also be called the number one given AZ has the sum of its values that can range from one to five points.
Or Duke play or also called the data number 2 Duke is the sum of its values which can vary from 2 to 10 points.
Given Duke or Duke play can also be called the number two given Duke has the sum of its values can range from two to ten points.
Or play suit or also called the data number 3 has suit the sum of their values may vary from 3 to 15 points.
Dado suit or move Suit can also be called the number Three has given suit the sum of its values that can vary from three to fifteen points.
Or block or move also called number 4 since the court is the sum of its values which may vary from 4 to 20 points.
Given the court or move court. It may also be called the number four is given Court the sum of its values which may vary from four to twenty points.
Cinchona or play or also called the data number 5 has Cinchona the sum of its values which may vary from 5 to 25 points.
Dado Quina Quina or move. It can also be called Five number. The Quina has given the sum of its values can range from five to twenty-five points.
Seine or move or also called the number 6 on the Sena has given the sum of its values that can vary from 6 to 30 points.
Data Sena or Sena move can also be called the number given six Sena has the sum of its values can range from six to thirty points.

In order to form the full play you need the five dice. Two data must be of a value since the other three data valor.Por another example the first two data values are 6-6 the other three data would be 4-4-4 and in encima illustration. The value of the play is full of 10 points but the move is of mouth value becomes 15 points.

Ful order to form FUL play you need the five dice data must be of a value since the other three data other value for example. The first two data values are six Six and the other three data would Four Four Four as in the illustration on top. The value of Ful move is ten points but if the move is the value of mouth becomes fifteen points. More what is Ful mouth? Ful mouth is when the play is performed once.

To form the next move. There are two types of sequence data. The first sequence is from 1 to 5 and the other sequence is from 2 to 6 e.g. 1-2-3-4-5 and 2-3-4-5-6 would be another sequence. As in encima illustration. The value to be marked then the play is 20 points but if the move is to mouth the point becomes 25.

Then. To form the next move there two types of sequence data. The first sequence is from 1 to five, and the other sequence is from 2 to six. For example. One Two Three Four and Five and the other sequence would be. two three four five six. As in encima illustration. The value to be marked then the move is twenty points. But if the move is to mouth the point becomes vite-five. More which is followed by mouth? Then mouth is when the move is performed once.

To be able to play a square must have four equal numbers. For example 2-2-2-2 as in the illustration on top. These four equal data can be of any value and the value that should be marked in the square pass is 30 points. But if the square is the mouth of the value becomes 35 points.

Square to be able to make a square move must have four equal numbers For example Two Two Two and Two As in encima illustration these four data equal can be of any value and the value that should be marked on the play square is thirty points but if the square for the mouth of the value becomes thirty-five points. More what it is square of mouth? mouth is square when play is performed once.

To form the General move you will need all five data are of the same value For example 5-5-5-5-5 data can be of any value if they are equal. The value to be marked on the move General is forty points. But if the move is General of mouth. Ai the value becomes 100 points and the move is completed immediately because the player who made the general\'s mouth wins the match with the sovereign point, regardless of whether another player is winning.

General to form the general move you will need all five data are of the same value for example. Five, five, five, five, and five. Such data may be any value. Since they are equal. The value to be marked on the move General is forty points. But if the move is General of mouth. Ai the value becomes a hundred points. And the move is terminated immediately. Because the player who made the general\'s mouth. Wins the game with the sovereign point. Regardless if another player is winning. More what is general of mouth? General\'s mouth when the move is performed once. And will round ends.
You can save your game group if you want to play later.
